# Data Structures in R

## Vectors

```{r}
names <- c("Nayad", "John", "James", "Andy", "George")
age <- c(20, 25, 27, 30, 31)
names (age) <- names
age ["Nayad"]
age [2]# indexing
age[3:5]
age [c(3,5)]# slicing
```
